name: Jay Shankar
bio: A technology professional, dedicated to mastering the cloud-native landscape, with a specialized focus on Kubernetes as the backbone for modern AI deployments. My expertise lies in bridging the gap between platform engineering and data science by implementing AI-assisted tools that automate infrastructure-as-code and cluster optimization. Through the Kubestronaut program, I advocate for the adoption of Kubernetes-native AI workflows that are both scalable and operationally efficient. I am actively researching how generative AI can further empower platform engineers to manage secure, scalable and complex distributed systems.
